edu.ncsu.csc316.spell_checker.rules

Class Rules

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.spell_checker.rules.Rules

  • public class Rules
extends java.lang.Object
    These transfomations are applied to words.
    Author:
    Nicholas Board (ndboard)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rules()
      Construct a Rules object so we can access the rule methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String adverbRule(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in ly, drop the ly.
      java.lang.String capitalizationRule(java.lang.String word)
      If the first letter of a word is capitalized, convert the first letter to lowercase.
      java.lang.String gerundRule1(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in ing, drop the ing.
      java.lang.String gerundRule2(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in ing, drop the ing, add an e.
      java.lang.String occupationRule1(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in r, drop the r.
      java.lang.String occupationRule2(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in er, drop the er.
      java.lang.String pastTenseRule1(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in d, drop the d.
      java.lang.String pastTenseRule2(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in ed, drop the ed.
      java.lang.String pluralityRule1(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in s, drop the s.
      java.lang.String pluralityRule2(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in es, drop the es.
      java.lang.String possessionRule(java.lang.String word)
      If the word ends in 's, drop the 's.

        public java.lang.String capitalizationRule(java.lang.String word)
        If the first letter of a word is capitalized, convert the first letter to lowercase. The > the
        Parameters:
        word - The word to change.
        Returns:
        The transformed word.

      • possessionRule

        public java.lang.String possessionRule(java.lang.String word)
        If the word ends in 's, drop the 's. cook's > cook
        Parameters:
        word - The word to change.
        Returns:
        The transformed word.
